message.text: After charging magic, release a breath-like flame in front of you. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Press the button right before the end to repeat the spell.</COL>
Emit lightning in a range outwards from you. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases range of the effect.</COL>

After charging magic, generate a dark fog. The fog will cling to enemies, dealing damage over time. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases duration of the effect. Increases the number of hits.</COL>
After charging magic, generate a giant spire of ice at the enemy's feet. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Adds an additional attack at the start of the effect.</COL>
After charging magic, generate a towering wall of flame. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases range of the effect.</COL>

After charging magic, brandish your archistaff, releasing a blade-shaped shockwave with Lightning/Slash attributes. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Shockwave will fire in 3 directions.</COL>

After charging magic, shake the earth, sending eruptions of stone high into the air. Inflicts damage of the Darkness attribute. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases number of rocks (1→2).</COL>
After charging magic, call meteors down from the heavens to land around the enemy. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases number of meteors (4→7).</COL>
